metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7945 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The RESTful control interface (aka RAPI or ganeti-rapi) in Ganeti before2.9.7, 2.10.x before 2.10.8, 2.11.x before 2.11.8, 2.12.x before 2.12.6,2.13.x before 2.13.3, 2.14.x before 2.14.2, and 2.15.x before 2.15.2 allowsremote attackers to obtain the DRBD secret via instance information jobresults.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7945` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ganeti - 2.16.0~rc2-1build1
ganeti-2.16 - 2.16.0~rc2-1build1
ganeti-haskell-2.16 - 2.16.0~rc2-1build1
ganeti-htools - 2.16.0~rc2-1build1
ganeti-htools-2.16 - 2.16.0~rc2-1build1
python-ganeti-rapi - 2.16.0~rc2-1build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ganeti package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.0~rc2-1build1').
